root.text:
Are you an Automobile aficionado?
This is your time to unleash the Eureka moment.
Tailoring an elegant wagon demands Modelling, Manufacturing and Marketing in a most efficient way. Auto-quiz assesses knowledge about the Auto-history, Cutting Edge technology, Motor sports and Car makers. Event comprises of General quiz, Virtual quiz, Connections. The first two rounds will make you recollect the facts and figures in automobile. And the final round demands you to think out of the box to arrive at creative answers.

text: Team may consist of maximum of two students.
The cumulative evaluation of the first two rounds is considered for the elimination process. Selected participants are allowed to participate in the final round.
Mobile phones are not allowed inside the test hall.
